class.name: PostScriptDriver
class.documentation: This is the default driver for Magics, and PostScript is the default output format.

parameter.name: output_ps_scale
parameter.documentation: Defines the PostScript scale between 0.1 and 1.0 (1.0 being the full page size).

parameter.name: output_ps_split
parameter.documentation: Enables the output to be split into different (single page) PostScript files.
